name: Sen. Elizabeth Warren
note: Champion of strict crypto controls; co-sponsored anti-self custody proposals.

name: Rep. Brad Sherman
note: Called for banning cryptocurrency; frequent critic of crypto.

name: Sen. Sherrod Brown
note: Advocate for tight regulation of digital assets as a banking concern.

name: Rep. Stephen Lynch
note: Proposed KYC-heavy bills that would affect on-chain privacy.

name: Sen. Dick Durbin
note: Co-sponsored anti-crypto measures and warned of systemic risk.
